originalText.text: This church is seriously amazing... They welcome you no matter what age & nationality, and is extremely diverse. Every Sunday, the pastors' testimonies feel extremely heartfelt and exactly just what I need to feel closer to god. They also do baptisms here every month, which I participated in, and it was a beautiful ceremony. There are also highly active in the nyc community and do alot of good missonary & volunteer work all over! This church will literally change your life!

originalText.text: Every Nation New York City is an amazing church. Going there, I found friends, community and people I could really live life with. It was an amazing experience and is definitely a church worth checking out if you visit New York City or have just recently moved. The people there really care about you and will help you with your life, which sometimes can get crazy especially if you live in New York City. They also have plenty of events for singles, married couples, and colleges students as well as missions opportunities all over the world. The staff there will make the time for you.  It's a great place of belonging and I can't imagine my life in New York City without this church!  Whether you feel overwhelmed by your problems, need to find a church, need to find out who you are, or just want to try something different, you'll find it at this church.

originalText.text: I’ve been a part of this church community for over 5 years, and they became my family for someone who had no immediate family in the area. The people are warm and hospitable (with yummy food and drinks always ready in the lobby before service!), the community is diverse (from Scotland to the Philippines to Cameroon, just to name a few countries represented!), and the weekly worship and sermon is what I can describe as strong, moving, relevant, and impactful. The church also provides so many other opportunities to learn more about Christian faith (weekly small groups and seminars), and also is a very social church so you feel a part of a community with others, and don’t feel alone in it, whether it’s grabbing dinner after service or catching up over coffee with a friend. Thankful for this church and so of course, would highly recommend!

originalText.text: Love this place of worship in Manhattan❤️

text.text: Love this place of worship in Manhattan❤️

originalText.text: In a city of million's of people pursing their dreams, while at the same time feeling alone, Every Nation NYC Church helps bridge the gap of loneliness and drive. It's a great place to build community, friends and family, while getting to know who Jesus is at your own pace. Anyone can come just as there are without feeling judged or out of place. If you are looking for a place to find hope, belonging, and faith this is the place to be!
